name: Better Days (Brix.exe)
description:
Hi there, Welcome to the Glee Club! I'm so excited that you're here! Let's sing songs together and maybe play a little bit, yet there is so much to uncover~

Oops, I haven't introduced you yet to our club members! Midori, cute and hard-headed, Layra, a big fuzzball~ Belle, a woman with blazing passion, Evelyn, the President of the club, and me, Chelsea, a bright and spirited girl, hehe~

We're going to have so much fun together!

Forever~ ♥

                                                                          

Warning: This game may contain flashing lights

                                                                          

This game is inspired by Doki Doki Literature Club. I really liked this game so most features is like DDLC but different.

Since this is still in the development stage, updates will be rare but big changes. Apparently, the sprites are not yet made due to the major focus being FEATURES that the game will have. I'm not that much of an artist but I will eventually try to add images of the sprites.

Sorry for the inconvenience!

                                                                          

This game is made with Ren'Py
